import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { getBlogDetails } from '../../../../store/actions'; export default function BlogDetails() { const blogs = useSelector((state) => state.blogs); const blogDetails = useSelector((state) => state.blogDetails); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const getBlogs = (params) => { dispatch(getBlogDetails(params)); }; useEffect(() => { getBlogDetails(blogs._id); }, []) return (

Car Owner Question with some details that will help other to answer

by {CarQuestionOWner}

Asked 1/10/2021{" "} Viewed 3 Answerd

Post Details

{blogDetails.body}

{" "} Tags{" "} BMW BMW2 BMW3
